body: @Mindblown agreed, Mashiro's behaviour towards Oujiwas different compare to this, but maybe she's just pretending. And as stated on ch 1, Mashiro and Ouji did have sex or some sort of sexual contact. So Mashiro's character may actually not do a complete 180. Maybe she's acting different towards Ouji whenever Keiko is around because she doesn't want to make her sister sad but she also doesn't want to give up Ouji. Overall, the story is kind of a mess But hey, the story might be a mess but atleast the H scenes are hot.
Yukari is that you? Wtf are you doing to Shinobu!!?
This makes no sense...  Mashiro’s character does a complete 180 for no reason
Hm.. but why she hate him now?
I found it!!! The Zashiki warashi of the intelectual villa artist!! Now my life is complete...
great art plus nice story plot equals great fap!
